root.message: The QUALITY_ASSURE field for indicator 2-4-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: FAO will work closely with countries for quality assurance. Not only will data collection for SDG 2.4.1 respect international standards, it will also adhere to FAO’s data quality assurance “Statistics Quality Assurance Framework” (http://www.fao.org/statistics/standards/en/).
